import pbp2 from './assets/bry.png'; export function About() { return (
{/* Content */}

Hi, I'm Bryan.

Mechanical Product Design Engineer

Ex-Google, Ex-Apple, UC Berkeley Alumni

M.S. Mechanical Engineering, 2017
B.S. Mechanical Engineering, 2016
B.S. Electrical Engineering Computer Science, 2016

I have 7 years of experience shipping multiple products in the consumer electronics industry. I've worked on small form factor products that are dense with integral subsystems.

Linkedin
); }
